STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Cook Up Delicious Meals with Ease
FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_BODY_TEXT_1: CookMate is your ultimate kitchen companion app.
FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_BODY_TEXT_2: Discover delicious recipes, plan meals, and shop for groceries.
FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_BODY_TEXT_3: Our app guides you through every step of cooking.
FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_BODY_TEXT_4: Master your culinary skills with CookMate.
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Discover delicious recipes, easy-to-follow guides, and personalized meal plans that make cooking a breeze.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Craft delicious meals step-by-step with our easy-to-follow recipe creator. Say goodbye to complicated cookbooks.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Get tailored recipe suggestions based on your dietary preferences, favorite ingredients, and cooking skills.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Automatically generate grocery lists for your planned meals, ensuring you never miss an ingredient.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Get real-time guidance and tips from our virtual chef as you cook, making every dish a success.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Easily track calories, macros, and nutritional values of your home-cooked meals for a healthier lifestyle.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Discover and share recipes with a vibrant community of food lovers, exploring new flavors and techniques.
HERO_SUBTITLE: Effortlessly plan, shop, and create delicious meals.
CONTACT_FORM_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get In Touch About Your Recipe App Needs
CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Let's talk about bringing your culinary vision to life!
PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Food App
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: What kind of recipes does the app offer?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app provides a vast collection of recipes across various cuisines and dietary preferences. From quick snacks to elaborate multi-course meals, you'll find recipes suitable for any occasion.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: Can I save my favorite recipes?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Absolutely! You can create a personal recipe box within the app to save all your favorite recipes. This feature allows you to easily access and reference the recipes you love.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: How do I search for specific recipes?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: The app offers an advanced search functionality that allows you to filter recipes based on ingredients, cuisines, dietary restrictions, cook time, and more. Simply enter your preferences, and the app will suggest tailored recipes.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Can I adjust the serving sizes of recipes?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Yes, our app includes a handy portion adjustment feature. With a simple tap, you can increase or decrease the serving sizes, and the ingredient quantities will automatically recalculate for your convenience.
CTA_BODY: Discover an app that empowers you to craft delectable dishes with ease. Explore a world of flavors and embrace your inner chef.
FAQ_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Frequently Asked Questions: Food Making App
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to common queries about our food making app
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: What can I make with this app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app allows you to browse thousands of recipes and prepare a wide variety of dishes, from simple snacks to elaborate multi-course meals.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: Do I need cooking experience to use the app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Not at all! The app provides step-by-step instructions, photos, and videos to guide beginners through each recipe. It's perfect for learning to cook.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: How do I find recipes I'll like?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: You can search and filter recipes based on ingredients, cuisine, dietary restrictions, cooking time, and more to find dishes suited to your tastes.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Can I save my favorite recipes?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Absolutely. You can create an account and save recipes to your personal collection for easy access anytime.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Is the app free to use?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: The basic app features are free, but we offer a premium subscription that unlocks additional content like advanced recipes and cooking classes.
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Our app simplifies meal planning by suggesting recipes based on your dietary preferences and ingredients on hand.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Follow along with video instructions from professional chefs to master new cooking techniques with ease.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Get tailored recipe suggestions that match your tastes and dietary needs, so you never run out of new meal ideas.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: FoodCraft is a delightful app designed for food lovers and home chefs. Explore a world of recipes, create your own culinary masterpieces, and share your passion for cooking with a vibrant community. Cook with passion, eat with joy!
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TE: Raving Reviews for Our Culinary App
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Don't just take our word for it - see what satisfied home chefs have to say!
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app is a game-changer for cooking at home! The recipes are easy to follow and the instructional videos are super helpful. My meals have never tasted better.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As a beginner in the kitchen, this app has been a lifesaver. The step-by-step guides make cooking feel approachable and fun. I'm gaining confidence with every dish I make!
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: I love how this app lets me explore cuisines from around the world. The variety of recipes is amazing, and the detailed ingredient lists make grocery shopping a breeze.
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_3: Rich, creamy dairy from sustainable farms

PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_5: Vibrant flavors from around the world

SIDEBAR_BOTTOM_SUBTEXT_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Discover recipes, plan meals, and elevate your cooking skills.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Discover recipes, plan meals, and cook with confidence using our intuitive app.
